title: News24.com | Two who allegedly posed as soldiers and raped KZN granny arrested
description: Two men, who allegedly posed as SA National Defence Force soldiers to rape and kill a granny in KwaZulu-Natal, have been arrested.
content:
Two men, who allegedly posed as SA National Defence Force (SANDF) soldiers to rape and kill a granny in KwaZulu-Natal, have been arrested, police said on Thursday.
The suspects are aged 24 and 27 and will be charged for murder and rape, police spokesperson C… [+1069 chars]
